import { useState } from 'react' import { FaEdit, FaTrash } from 'react-icons/fa' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deleteUser, updateUserRole } from '../features/auth/authSlice' function UserItem({ user }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false) const [role, setRole] = useState(user.role) // Handle role update return (

{user.name}

{user.email}

{isEditing ? (
) : (

Role: {user.role}

)}
) } export default UserItem
